description:
Saitou and the others have returned to their everyday lives. Then, one day, Lafanpan takes a bath in a mysteriously pattered cup and something completely unexpected happens.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichiban Hitsuyou to Shite Iru Hito
La personne qui en a le plus besoin
The One Who Needs It Most
いちばん必要としている人
